privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: At Kassara, protecting your personal data is of utmost importance to us. This Privacy Policy provides detailed information about how we collect, process, store, and protect your data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable data protection laws.
privacy.companyText:
Company Name: Kassara
Address: Beykoz/Istanbul
Tax ID: 1470495021
Contact: info@kassara.app
privacy.dataCollectionText: When using our application, we collect the following personal data:
dataItems: Identity Data: Name, surname, email address from OAuth providers (Google, Meta, Apple)
Communication Data: WhatsApp communication history and messaging records
Usage Data: Fortune reading history, preferences, in-app activities
Technical Data: IP address, device information, browser type, operating system
Location Data: General location information (country/city level)
Cookie Data: Cookies necessary for session management and authentication
privacy.purposeText: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
purposeItems: Service provision and user account management
Token system and payment transaction management
Storage of fortune reading history and preferences
privacy.legalBasisText: The legal basis for our data processing activities:
privacy.dataSharingText: We do not share your personal data with third parties except in the following cases:
dataSharingItems: OAuth providers (Google, Meta, Apple) - for authentication purposes
Keycloak identity management system - for secure session management
Authorities when required by legal obligations
Cases where your explicit consent is given
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal data for the following periods:
dataRetentionItems: Account data: As long as the account is active
Fortune reading history: Until account deletion
Legal obligation: As required by relevant legislation
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement the following technical and administrative measures to ensure the security of your personal data:
privacy.userRightsText: Under GDPR and applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
userRightsItems: Right to know whether your personal data is being processed
Right to request information about your processed personal data
Right to know the purpose of processing and whether it is used appropriately
Right to know third parties to whom your data is transferred
Right to request correction of incomplete or incorrect data
Right to request deletion or destruction of your data under certain conditions
Right to request notification of correction and deletion to third parties
Right to object to automated decision-making that may adversely affect you
accountDeletionItems: All your personal data is immediately deleted
Your fortune reading history and preferences are removed
System logs are automatically deleted after 6 months
Data required by legal obligations is preserved
privacy.cookiesText: We use the following types of cookies in our application:
cookiesItems: Essential Cookies: Required for session management and security
Preference Cookies: For language selection and user settings
privacy.ageRestrictionText: Our application is for users aged 18 and above. Use by persons under 18 is strictly prohibited.
privacy.entertainmentText: The Kassara application is purely for entertainment purposes. All fortune services offered are not real predictions, future forecasts, or professional consultation. Users should use these services only for entertainment purposes.
privacy.internationalText: GDPR provisions do not apply to users outside the European Union. However, our data protection standards are at the same level for all users.
privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy as needed. In case of significant changes, we will inform our users via email.
privacy.contactText: You can submit your requests regarding your personal data to info@kassara.app. Applications will be responded to within 30 days.
privacy.authorityText: If you believe your rights have been violated, you can apply to the relevant data protection authority in your jurisdiction.
